TextpageLeftNav.bodyText:
Power BI Workspace Collection

Embed fully interactive, stunning data visualizations in your applications

1RMB Trial Buy Now

Power BI Workspace Collection offers complete interactive and amazing visual effects to client-side smart applications without spending any time or cost to build from scratch.

Pricing Details

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

Free Standard
Pricing by Session (every 100 sessions) The first 100 sessions of every month are free of charge ￥ 32.86 /month

(1) Major and important features need to be added to our services. Application programs, in essence, are not alternatives to any Power BI services,

(2) Provided for third parties,

Only when your application programs meet the two conditions above can you use the Power BI Workspace Collection service in your applications.

Power BI Workspace Collection cannot be used for the internal business applications of an organization, unless an internal user has a Power BI Pro User Subscription License (USL).

FAQ

Expand all
  • What is a session and how it is charged?

    A session refers to a set of interactive activities between the end-user and a Power BI Workspace Collection report. A session is established whenever Power BI Workspace Collection is displayed to the user and the subscriber is charged for using the session service. Session service is charged at a flat rate independent from the number of visual object elements in the report or the refresh rate of report contents. The end of a session occurs when a user closes the report or one hour after the session is enabled, whichever occurs first.

  • What is the relationship between Power BI Workspace Collection and Power BI service?

    Power BI Workspace Collection and Power BI Service are two independent products/services. Power BI Workspace Collection is charged and deployed through Azure portal, specially designed for ISV and dash boards embedded by enterprises in their application programs for third-party usage. Power BI Service is charged and deployed through the O365 Portal. It is an independent, universal BI product, mainly for the internal use of enterprises. For further information about Power BI Service, please visit www.microsoft.com/china/powerbi.

  • Can the Power BI Workspace Collection be used to establish internal applications?

    Power BI Workspace Collection cannot be used for internal business applications of your enterprise, unless the internal users have the Power BI Pro User Subscription License (USL). Power BI Workspace Collection is only for applications provided for third parties. If you want to use Power BI Workspace Collection to develop internal business application programs, every internal user is expected to have a Power BI Pro USL and your organization has to pay for Power BI Workspace Collection apart from paying Power BI Pro USL fees. To avoid Power BI Pro USL fees and cost of using Power BI Workspace Collection in internal application programs, Power BI Service offers its own content embedding feature outside Power BI Workspace Collection without increasing extra costs for Power BI USL owners.

Region

Power BI Workspace Collection is available in the following regions:

Territory Region
Mainland China China North, China East

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support and select self-help service or any other method to contact us for support.

We guarantee at least 99.9% availability of Power BI Workspace Collection when users execute API to call or insert reports. To learn more about the details of our Service Level Agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreements page.
